Seismic.jl
======================================

Installation
=====================

Seismic.jl is installed by typing the following at the julia REPL::
 
    Pkg.add("Seismic")

Guide
^^^^^

   :maxdepth: 2

   imaging
   plotting
   modelling
   solvers
   utils
   api
   license
